title: An Act directing the City of Boston Fire Department to waive the maximum age requirement for firefighters for Stylianos Katikakis

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Biele of Boston, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 4582) of David Biele (with the approval of the mayor and city council) that city of Boston be authorized to waive the maximum age requirement for firefighters for Stylianos Katikakis.  Public Service.  [Local Approval Received.]

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Service
Hearing scheduled for 11/20/2025 from 05:00 PM-05:00 PM in Written Testimony Only
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling

related_entities.name: committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling
the committee on House Steering, Policy and Scheduling
